name: Radios
description:
In the Help Room, there is a radio underneath the red flag. Knife or shoot the radio, and it will start playing music from the Zombies mode.

[*Black Ops III* only] In the Starting Room, in the corner in front of the HELP door, there is a radio on the ground. Interact with it to hear a recording from Dr. Monty on Nacht Der Untoten.
